name: devotio
description:
devotio is a game created by two indie developers Vinyz and Drob. The game takes place in a fictional universe where you have to make a choice of the following actions to advance the plot. interesting characters and as many as 5 different endings . 

the patch fixes the errors of the old version and fixes bugs such as:

 1. incorrect hard-to-read characters are replaced with normal ones.

 2. incorrect display of sounds in different endings. 

3.fixed triggers when pressed.
